ltl2rabin

Class Automaton<T,U>

  • Object
    • ltl2rabin.Automaton<T,U>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the labels of the states.
    U - The type of the letters the automaton runs on.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MojmirAutomaton, RabinAutomaton

    public abstract class Automaton<T,U>
extends Object
    This is the abstract base class for all automata. It contains the abstract base classes Automaton.State and Automaton.Transition. Automata have in common that they have a transition system (states + transitions) and their states are labeled. Acceptance conditions are handled by the subclasses of this class.

    Note: This class only describes deterministic automata.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Automaton.State<R,S>
      The abstract base class for all states.
      static class  Automaton.Transition<S extends Automaton.State,L>
      A Transition represents a function (State → Letter → State).
